title: Drawing, Elevation and Plan for Sideboard with Reeded Pilasters, 1900–05
title_raw: Elevation and Plan for Sideboard with Reeded Pilasters
medium: Graphite and yellow pencil on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left of elevation with pointing arrows: carved; below that: shelf inside; at lower right with arrow: "reeded"; below center: FRONT VIEW.  Inscribed in graphite inside plan view: "PLAN"; across bottom of plan, a scale of measurment; and along bottom of p lan and right of both views: numerical notations
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Elevation: front of sideboard with tri-partite front divided by four reeded pilasters; central front has four horizontal drawers with "C"-shaped handles indicated in yellow pencil; side sections each have a closed cupboard topped with single drawer; low backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Elevation and Plan for Sideboard with Reeded Pilasters, 1900–05. Graphite and yellow pencil on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-33.
